text: Ah, what a tragedy... a real tragedy...
The bridge! It's gone! Just like my will to exercise.
The one that was here! Super convenient, always in the right spot, just the right width... *sigh*
Look, I'd fix it myself, but unfortunately, I have a rare condition called 'Too Lazy to Try.'
So, yeah... would be *real nice* if someone just happened to help me, you know? Maybe someone with, say, *protagonist energy*?
Seriously?! That’s incredible! Almost like the game *wants* you to help me! What are the odds?
I heard magicians can literally rewrite reality. Maybe you could find one of those convenient world-editing types?
Oh, perfect! In that case, could you just *casually* edit that way-too-convenient floating platform over there? You know, the one that exists *only* for this exact moment?
You did it! Wow! How did you *ever* manage to solve this incredibly difficult puzzle? Truly, you are the *chosen one*.
